text: 8.29 Jon 17.22, 2 Ko 3.18, Epe 1.5, 1.11, Kol 1.5, 1.11, 1.18, 2 Ti 2.19, Hib 1.6 God binɨb kɨlop dɨnɨm agɨl gos nɨgup anɨb okok, kɨlop bɨlel gos nɨŋɨd gos ne ke nep kɨdek gɨl kɨlop aglɨl agak, Yad gen kɨli ñɨ yad mɨdeb tek yenɨgel agak. Anɨgek, Klays ne nɨmam ned ak yek, nɨmam nɨnay ne kɨdek okok kuŋay yɨbɨl yenɨgabal.
